testCase.name: FormSelect renders with label and required indicator
FormSelect renders without label
FormSelect displays error message when error prop is provided
FormSelect applies invalid class when error is present
FormSelect calls onChange when selection changes
FormSelect renders chevron icon by default
FormSelect applies correct classes to select element
FormSelect forwards ref correctly
Select renders with a placeholder
Select opens dropdown when clicked
Select selects an option when clicked
Select displays selected value
Select renders label when provided
Select disables the select when disabled prop is true
Select shows error message when invalid
Select handles keyboard navigation
Select Select and SelectMenu renders all options in the SelectMenu when opened
Select Select and SelectMenu closes the SelectMenu when an option is selected
Select Select and SelectMenu highlights the selected option in the SelectMenu
Select Select and SelectMenu closes the SelectMenu when clicking outside
Select Select and SelectMenu updates the SelectMenu width when the Select button width changes
useRowSelection Hook Initialization should initialize with default values
useRowSelection Hook Initialization should initialize with provided initial selected IDs
useRowSelection Hook Initialization should initialize with correct multipleSelect setting
useRowSelection Hook Single Row Selection Multiple Select Mode should select a single row
useRowSelection Hook Single Row Selection Multiple Select Mode should select multiple rows
useRowSelection Hook Single Row Selection Multiple Select Mode should deselect a row
useRowSelection Hook Single Row Selection Single Select Mode should select only one row at a time
useRowSelection Hook Single Row Selection Single Select Mode should deselect the current row when selecting false
useRowSelection Hook Select All Functionality Multiple Select Mode should select all selectable rows
useRowSelection Hook Select All Functionality Multiple Select Mode should deselect all rows
useRowSelection Hook Select All Functionality Multiple Select Mode should merge with existing selections
useRowSelection Hook Select All Functionality Single Select Mode should select only the first selectable row
useRowSelection Hook Select All Functionality Single Select Mode should handle empty data gracefully
useRowSelection Hook Selection State Checks should correctly identify when all visible rows are selected
useRowSelection Hook Selection State Checks should correctly identify when some rows are selected
useRowSelection Hook Selection State Checks should correctly identify when no rows are selected
useRowSelection Hook Selection State Checks should handle data with all disabled rows
useRowSelection Hook Utility Methods Batch Operations should select multiple rows with selectRows
useRowSelection Hook Utility Methods Batch Operations should deselect multiple rows with deselectRows
useRowSelection Hook Utility Methods Batch Operations should handle duplicate IDs in batch operations
useRowSelection Hook Utility Methods Single Row Operations should select single row with selectRow
useRowSelection Hook Utility Methods Single Row Operations should deselect single row with deselectRow
useRowSelection Hook Utility Methods Single Row Operations should toggle row selection with toggleRow
useRowSelection Hook Utility Methods Data Utilities should return selected rows data with getSelectedRows
useRowSelection Hook Utility Methods Data Utilities should clear all selections with clearSelection
useRowSelection Hook Utility Methods Data Utilities should select all visible rows with selectAllRows
useRowSelection Hook Utility Methods Data Utilities should deselect all rows with deselectAllRows
useRowSelection Hook External Callbacks should call onSelectionChange callback when provided
useRowSelection Hook External Callbacks should call onSelectionChange for bulk selectAll operation
useRowSelection Hook External Callbacks should work without external callback
useRowSelection Hook Edge Cases should handle selecting non-existent row IDs
useRowSelection Hook Edge Cases should handle deselecting non-selected rows
useRowSelection Hook Edge Cases should maintain selection order
useRowSelection Hook Edge Cases should handle single select mode with batch operations
useRowSelection Hook Edge Cases should handle different source types
useRowSelection Hook Performance and Stability should maintain referential stability of handlers
useRowSelection Hook Performance and Stability should handle rapid selection changes
useRowSelection Hook Performance and Stability should work with custom row ID extraction
MenuItem renders children correctly
MenuItem calls onClick when clicked and not disabled
MenuItem does not call onClick when clicked and disabled
MenuItem renders as selected when isSelected is true
MenuItem renders icon when selected and iconSelected is provided
MenuItem applies correct ARIA attributes
